H0.text: The Royal Shakespeare Company is based in which British town. Stratford-upon-Avon

A4.text: The Royal Shakespeare Company is a major British theatre company, based in Stratford-upon-Avon, Warwickshire, England.

A5.text: The company's home is in Stratford-upon-Avon, where it has redeveloped its Royal Shakespeare and Swan theatres as part of a Â£112.8-million 'Transformation' project.
